SELECT order_return.id, order_return.order_return, sku.name AS sku_name, sku. LEVEL, sku_type.text AS sku_type_1, sku_type1.text AS sku_type_2, order_return_sku.measure_unit, order_return_sku.number, order_return_sku.price, provider.name, provider.address FROM oms_order_return_sku order_return_sku LEFT JOIN oms_order_return order_return ON order_return.id = order_return_sku.order_id LEFT JOIN oms_order_buy order_buy ON order_buy.id = order_return.buy_order_id LEFT JOIN oms_cmn_provider provider ON provider.id = order_buy.coma LEFT JOIN oms_sku sku ON sku.id = order_return_sku.sku_id LEFT JOIN oms_sku_type sku_type ON sku_type.id = sku.type_id LEFT JOIN oms_sku_type sku_type1 ON sku_type1.id = sku_type.parent_id where order_return_sku.is_delete = 'N'
and order_return = #{_order_no}
and provider.name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{_name}, '%')
and sku_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{_sku_name}, '%')
and provider.address LIKE CONCAT('%', #{_address}, '%')
ORDER BY order_return_sku.update_time DESC
